name: Earth Friendly Buys
tag_list: green, eco-friendly, organic, environment, natural, earth-friendly
overview:
An online resource of eco-friendly companies, products and services. By supporting the companies on the site, you will reduce your carbon footprint and protect our environment for our children and grandchildren.

The company’s goal is to make it easy for consumers to support a green, clean economy. All of the site’s member companies are environmentally conscious. Whether you are looking for clothing, organic food, sustainable building materials, energy-efficient appliances or anything in between, Earth Friendly Buys strives to be your most reliable and comprehensive resource on the web.
